actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure failed of passage in House under suspension of rules, roll call #596 (211-203).

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the act of August 25, 1958, with respect to staff allowances for former Presidents.

summary.text: States that the aggregate amount of compensation paid to persons employed by a former President during the first 30-month period during which such former President is entitled to staff assistance shall not exceed $150,000 per year. Authorizes adjustments in the aggregate amount of such salaries in proportion to any adjustment in rates of pay under the General Schedule.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of August 25, 1958, with respect to staff allowances for former Presidents.
